item.title: Log4j 2 YAML Configuration with Console Appender
item.description: Java Code Examples for using org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger The Java code example below to show you how to configure Log4j 2 with YAML configuration file to log messages to sytem console using Console appender. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Adding Log2j 2 Dependencies to your project In order to read YAML configuration file Log4j 2 using Jackson and jackson-dataformat-yaml libraries so that you need to add these dependencies to your project.
